artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: walking woman wearing a black coat with flowers at hem, holding a brown and tan umbrella; snow on tree at L and trees in background and on column at R
inscription: 昭和五年庚午冬 {Shōwa gonen kanoeuma fuyu} (Winter 1930)
markings: red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui}; BRC, publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe}; on back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第百八拾九番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai hyakuhachijūkyū ban} (edition of 250, number 189); red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The First Collection of Modern Beauties (Gendai bijin shū dai isshū 現代美人集第一輯)
title: The Grounds of a Shrine in Snow
